name: Mahjong Solitaire·
description:
Mahjong Solitaire is a relaxing, logic based game. Now available to play for free from MobilityWare, the ORIGINAL maker of Solitaire with Daily Challenges. This game is challenging, but helps relieve stress and puzzles your brain for hours of endless fun!

== How to Play ==
The goal of the game is to remove all the tiles from the board by matching pairs.
Select tiles with the same picture and they will disappear. You can only removed tiles that are free and not covered.

Mahjong Solitaire Features
Two Touch Mechanic
Traditional Deals
Unlimited Free Shuffles
Traditional/Card Tile sets
Hundreds of Game Boards
Statistics Tracking
